column4:
A step down from our PRO and Thermoshield winter jackets in terms of protection. For intermediate winter conditions combining our CS Tech Fleece with our wind resistant Thermosheld material.


Features:



  • front panel made from our exclusive CS ThermoShield

  • side and back panels made from our CS Tech-Fleece

  • unlimited number of colors

  • full concealed zipper

  • high collar

  • separate side panels

  • three rear pockets

Welcome to a revolution in clear rain jacket technology.  Unlike clear rain jackets of the past, our seamless clear rain jacket is both breathable and wind/water resistant.  Constructed of CS Seamless Technology, the entire jacket does not use traditional sewn seams but instead all seams are bonded.  CS Seamless Technology increases circulation and improves comfort not to mention it will keep the rain and wind out.  Your team logo can be screen printed on the upper right front only.  Also available in a sleeveless vest style – very euro! 


*Minimum of ten pieces required in order to print your own custom logo.

Full length fleece bib knickers for the ultimate protection in cold weather riding


Features:



  • unlimited number of colours

  • made from genuine CS Tech Fleece

  • zippered ankles with reflective piping

  • CS Tech Fleece is an incredibly lightweight and warm brushed fleece. It’s a single-sided fleece, which means that only the inside is fleece-lined. The outside has a smooth finish. 


WHICH CHAMOIS PAD?





 CS VIVID – Safety in Style – add this option when you order. Find out more here

A Champion System exclusive! While we love our ThermoShield Winter Jacket, the fact is it's designed for serious winter riding and sometimes it's too warm.  The CS Tech Fleece Jersey is the answer! We've made a lightweight fleece jersey that is perfect for spring and autumn riding. Made from the same CS Tech Fleece fabric used in our arm, leg and knee warmers,  this lightweight jacket is ideal when a Long Sleeve Jersey is not enough and a ThermoShield Winter Jacket is too much.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colors

  • brushed fleece lining

  • three rear pockets

  • high collar

  • separate side panels

  • full concealed zipper

Features:



  • made from our exclusive CS ThermoShield fabric

  • unlimited number of colors

  • full concealed zipper

  • high collar

  • separate side panels

  • three rear pockets

Made from the same CS Tech fabric used in our Short Sleeve Jersey, our Long Sleeve Jersey is perfect for cool days when you want to take the chill off in cooler temperatures. For a warmer jacket we suggest our CS Tech Fleece Jacket - it's fleece lined and ideal for spring and fall riding. Picture a long sleeve fleece-lined jersey and that's the CS Tech Fleece Jacket.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colors

  • three rear pockets

  • high collar

  • separate side panels

  • no extra charge for 3/4 or full length zippers

Lighweight shell vest or gillet. Designed to be folded or rolled into your jersey pocket with ease.


Features:



  • made from our exclusive CS WindGuard fabric

  • unlimited number of colors

  • mesh back

  • high collar

  • separate side panels

  • NOTE: This vest does not come with rear pockets

The CS Cycle Short has been developed over a number of years to be leading the custom market for comfort and design. 


Our short now features our exclusive CS Contour Fabric. This fabric was developed specifically for our needs and features a revolutionary yarn layup that promotes increased breathability, compression and comfort. 


NOTE: Children's Sizing Available at $85.00 per cycle short


Features:


-          CS CONTOUR LYCRA exclusive to CS, imported directly from Italy.


-          83% Polyester  17% Spandex fabric blend, 360g/y fabric weight.


-          Unlimited colours.


-          Double rear panel.


-          3 anatomic panel options.


-          Silicone leg grippers.


-          Male and Female Specific sizing and chamois.

The Champion System Hybrid Jacket is the perfect jacket for active use in a wide range of sports. The front of the jacket and sleeves feature our CS WindGuard fabric, offering complete windproof protection. On the back, the upper utilizes CS WindGuard fabric, while the lower portion is made from a heavyweight fleece fabric. Only the CS WindGuard fabric areas can be printed with your logos. Additional features include two rear zippered pockets and two-way front zipper. Available in set-in sleeve design only.

3/4 Length lycra bib knickers come half way up the calf - ideal to take off the winter chill.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colors

  • mesh shoulder straps

Fleece 3/4 Bib Knicker that sits half way up the calf, providing excellent warmth and comfort.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colors

  • mesh shoulder straps

  • CS Tech Fleece is an incredibly lightweight and warm brushed fleece. It’s a single-sided fleece, which means that only the inside is fleece-lined. The outside has a smooth finish.
